subject: Lacrosse
Sporting Goods and Equipment
Leather and Leather Goods
Native Americans
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: A Baltimore family that has had eight siblings play Division I lacrosse has been woven together by its love for the sport — and by their father’s leather-strung sticks.
snippet: A Baltimore family that has had eight siblings play Division I lacrosse has been woven together by its love for the sport — and by their father’s leather-strung sticks.
